text: Better than Jackass 4
I loved it, don't know why audiences hate it so much, it wasn't that bad.
Jackass never make single worst movie. It's fun, it's fresh, it's funny. Still golden, always forever.
Es, como lo dice su nombre, una version .5 de la película original, incluye buenos sketch´s pero va mas del tipo "documental" de la 4 película.
it I crazy how people like these type of movies ,they are sooooo disgusting not funny at all and very sexualized I dont liked it because it was just so unwatchable
Has a few funny moments, but on the whole, this is a rather insipid affair.
Getting out of hand and no longer that funny
It's what I expected out of a Jackass documentary. Sometimes more, sometimes less. I thought it was fine for what it was. 🍅

Jackass 4.5 deserves high marks for even just discovering why Johnny Knoxville's hair is turned gray, lol. With the participation of the behind-the-scenes, it became a much more enjoyable and emotional, documentary-like job. I know that my generation would love this.
More nudity than anything I have previously seen. Many of the clever qualities that made previous Jackass movies worth watching have been reduced to nothing of value.
Better than Jackass Forever! (And I loved that movie) love just seeing them talk and laugh together and all the behind the scenes stuff really makes you appreciate Jackass Forever even more
58%. 7/8/22. Just another solid Jackass movie. No great pranks. Nothing about it was very funny.
They doesn't aged well.
Outstanding new cast and a well made movie. I laughed and/or was on the edge of my seat thru 100% of the movie. job well done.
Basically, another typical .5 edition of the main movie but funny enough for a time killer at home.
Although it may not have the same exact zing. I love these guys 3.4

I always welcome a chance to spend more time with the Jackass crew but I think the addition of more in depth behind the scenes footage and interviews made this a much stronger release than any of the previous 1/2 films. 7.5/10

This movie explains why the new memebers were added. It wasn't explained in Jackass Forever so it's nice that we finally hear how johnny found them each. I like "initiation" to get back in the movie cast (just look for hot sauce scene). i laughed a lot watching this. After you watch it you might feel this really is the last Jackass sequel ever. Enjoy their goodbye. I hope they all find some future new Hollywood roles.
Some very funny bits that could have easily made it in to the feature film.
Not quite as intense as the others.  A bit more acting, a bit less funny, a whole lot more interview-y.
